TCMDATA: Traditional Chinese Medicine Data Analysis and Visualization Preface

TCMDATA: Traditional Chinese Medicine Data Analysis and Visualization Yulab-SMU 2026-02-08 Preface Welcome to the TCMDATA user guide. TCMDATA is an integrated R package for TCM pharmacology data retrieval, network analysis, and visualization. This guide walks you through installation, core functionality, and advanced workflows.
Chapter 1 Load TCM Data 1.1 Core functions 1.2 Output

Chapter 1 Load TCM Data This chapter documents data loading workflows in TCMDATA. 1.1 Core functions search_herb() search_target() 1.2 Output Describe the returned tables, key fields, and expected formats here.
Chapter 2 Pre-analysis This chapter covers data cleaning and preprocessing steps before analysis. 2.1 Suggested workflow Data filtering Identifier normalization Deduplication
Chapter 3 Molecule detection This chapter describes molecule detection and annotation workflows. 3.1 Topics SMILES parsing PubChem queries Similarity filtering
Chapter 4 Enrichment analysis This chapter outlines enrichment analysis workflows. 4.1 Topics ORA GSEA Visualization
Chapter 5 PPI analysis This chapter documents PPI network construction and analysis. 5.1 Topics Network building Topology metrics Community detection
Chapter 6 Other resources This chapter introduces additional resources and datasets. 6.1 Topics TF–target interactions Gut microbiota–metabolite links External databases
